gunsmith_tombstone.name: Old Pete

cavalry_fort.name: Sergeant Morrison
cavalry_fort.title: Cavalry Instructor
cavalry_fort.description: A grizzled cavalry veteran who's survived more battles than he can count.

wilderness_guide.name: Silent Fox

wilderness_guide.description: A native scout who knows every trail and trick for surviving the frontier.

gambler_saloon.title: Professional Gambler
gambler_saloon.description: A sharply dressed card shark who's been run out of every major city.

army_doctor.title: Army Surgeon
army_doctor.description: A skilled surgeon who's patched up more gunshot wounds than she'd like to remember.

witch_swamp.name: Mama Eulalia
witch_swamp.title: Swamp Witch
witch_swamp.description: An ancient woman of mysterious origins. Some say she's been here since before the war.
